thread.title: Springleaf Shares Fall on Potential Delay in OneMain Deal
thread.title_full: Springleaf Shares Fall on Potential Delay in OneMain Deal

title: Springleaf Shares Fall on Potential Delay in OneMain Deal
text:
Springleaf Shares Fall on Potential Delay in OneMain Deal Springleaf agreed in March to buy OneMain from Citigroup By christina.rexrode@wsj.com Updated Aug. 6, 2015 2:23 p.m. ET 
A $4.25 billion deal between a giant bank and an upstart consumer lender may have to wait a bit longer. 
Shares of Springleaf Holdings Inc. fell about 7% Thursday afternoon, after the subprime lender said a U.S. Department of Justice antitrust investigation could delay its planned purchase of rival OneMain Financial from Citigroup Inc. 
... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Popular on WSJ
